author: Staff Reporter
text:
Interview to recruit persons for the posts of school noon meal organizer and cooking assistant in Tiruvannamalai district have been postponed due to the ongoing government employees strike.

The interviews were scheduled for February 15 and 16. District Collector A. Gnanasekaran issued orders to Block Development Officers’ to this effect.

Applications were received from aspirants for 484 posts of noon meal organizers and 463 posts of noon meal cooking assistants in the district and the interview of aspirants was scheduled to be held in respective blocks on February 15 and 16.

However since all the officials who are supposed to conduct the interview are on strike the interviews have been postponed indefinitely.Alternative

If there was no resolution to the strike in a couple of days, the district administration would explore alternative ways to conduct the interview, sources said..

The district administration would soon explore ways to conduct the interviews
title: Noon meal organiser, cook recruitment interview postponed
